titles.title: A bill to authorize the issuance of a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel CROYANCE.
A bill to authorize the issuance of a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel CROYANCE.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel CROYANCE.
